about.p1: Systems Engineer focused on Frontend development with React. I'm passionate about understanding how every part of an application fits into a larger flow and how technological solutions impact users.
about.p2: I have experience working in agile environments, contributing to enterprise platforms and following solid development best practices. I'm currently sharpening my skills in React, testing and Frontend architecture.
about.p3: I'm looking for a role where I can contribute from day one and continue growing as a developer.
